resources.string:
-> Leave Team Name as IT IS if going || FOR SOLO ||.


-> Enter the Details of ONE member FIRST and click on verify.


-> Click on + button to add the details for another member.


-> Double CHECK The Details Before Clicking |VERIFY| Button.


-> AFTER ADDED, Click Submit Button.

-> Enter the Details of ONE member FIRST and click on verify.


-> Click on + button to add the details for another member.


-> Double CHECK The Details Before Clicking |VERIFY| Button.


-> AFTER ADDED, Click Submit Button.
-> Enter the Details and Click Register.\n\n-> on successful registration, confirmation mail will sent to your mail.

-> Entry Fee FOR SOLO:RS 20 

 -> Entry Fee FOR TEAM:RS 100

For Payment
 Mobile no-9777527505
 Location -seminar hall (3rd floor ,CSE DEPARTMENT)
